meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of fungi of the class Ascomycetes.
meanings.sent1: The ascomycetous mushrooms have unique spore-producing structures.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the ascomycetous fungi to understand their growth patterns.
meanings.sent3: The ascomycetous mold seemed to dance in the petri dish.
meanings.sent4: Her garden was a colorful canvas painted with various ascomycetous species.
meanings.sent5: The ascomycetous nature of the organism made it stand out among the rest.

meanings.definition: A fungus of the class Ascomycetes.
meanings.sent1: The ascomycetous was carefully examined under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: Farmers rely on ascomycetous for crop protection.
meanings.sent3: The ascomycetous in the forest whispered secrets to the trees.
meanings.sent4: The ascomycetous spread its spores like whispers in the wind.
meanings.sent5: Children marveled at the tiny ascomycetous growing on the fallen log.
